title: cant leftclick to target champions
body: have somehow managed to unbind something so i can't use my MB1 to target people, anyone knows where the thing is and what to bind it to if u understand

replies.body:
Dang, that really stinks! You can reset your input settings with the steps below:

**Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your config folder, which should be in your install directory:

**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

>Delete these two files:

>** input.ini
PersistedSettings.json**

After deleting those files, leave the match, then hop into another custom match with bots to confirm the change went through successfully.

Let me know if this helped resolve the issue.
